name: Unknown Space
description:
Currently a work in progress, this is my first Unity game which I have developed while at uni. I am releasing this to motivate me to build upon it in the future.

 Feel free to critique and give feedback as that will help me learn. I plan to implement pause menu and save functionality as well as known bug fixing at a later date.

I would also like to say I did not create the art, save for particle effects, nor the sounds. I got them from open source websites. Will update with links later.
